response.original_title: X: The Man with the X-Ray Eyes
response.overview: X: The Man with X-Ray Eyes. is a remake of the Roger Corman film of the same name, the plot is as follows: World-renowned scientist Dr. James Xavier who experiments with human eyesight. He devises some eye drops that give a person the power to see through objects. As the tagline declared: suddenly he could see through clothes, flesh . . . and walls! Those are some mighty eye drops indeed!
response.title: X: The Man with the X-Ray Eyes

titles.title: El hombre con rayos X en los ojos
